meanings.sent1: The happy child was clothed in a warm sweater.
meanings.sent2: The man was clothed in a suit for the job interview.
meanings.sent3: The cat felt fancy when clothed in a tiny bow tie.
meanings.sent4: The forest was clothed in a blanket of snow.
meanings.sent5: The superhero was clothed in a cape that billowed behind him.

meanings.sent1: The dollhouse had tiny rooms clothed in colorful curtains.
meanings.sent2: The tree was clothed in leaves of vibrant green.
meanings.sent3: The cake was clothed in a layer of sugary frosting.
meanings.sent4: The night sky was clothed in a blanket of twinkling stars.
meanings.sent5: The car was clothed in a shiny coat of red paint.
